jobDescription: Interface with clients, understand business objectives, provide solutions. Design and develop BI dashboards. Data engineering, ETL/ELT processes. Build data pipelines. Data warehousing using cloud services. Large-scale AI agent development. Machine learning for computer vision, speech recognition, prediction. Data analytics, insights generation, client advisory.
preferredQualifications: Ability to adapt in a fast-paced environment
